title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The org.eclipse.swt.internal.BidiUtil class in the win32 implementation has a line of code that uses Class.forName() to instantiate a Callback object. However, this usage of Class.forName() causes a NoClassDefFoundError in the CLDC version of SWT.
EB: The line of code that uses Class.forName() should be removed and replaced with a private constructor for the BidiUtil class. Since there are no nonstatic methods in this class, making the constructor private will prevent unnecessary instantiation.
